overview:
As GM of the Marketing Solutions Group, Nate leads the business unit responsible for developing and delivering an AtTask solution specifically catered to marketing and creative teams.

One of AtTask’s co-founders, Bowler served as AtTask’s CTO overseeing the product development and IT organizations. Previously he worked at Excite@Home developing shared hosting and e-commerce solutions and at Novations Group, creating solutions for the management consulting firm.

While still a technologist at heart, Bowler has enjoyed the opportunity to use his product and industry experience to work much more closely with customers in helping them achieve their work management goals.

Bowler enjoys the many outdoor activities living in Utah affords. When Bowler isn’t riding ATVs, skiing down the slopes, or chipping for birdie, heâ€™s spending time with family or rooting for UNLV basketball.

Nate holds a bachelors degree in Computer Science from Brigham Young University.
